code: @Converter public static String feedToXml(SyndFeed feed) throws FeedException {     SyndFeedOutput out = new SyndFeedOutput().     return out.outputString(feed). }
@Converter public static SyndFeed xmlToFeed(String xml) throws FeedException {     SyndFeedInput input = new SyndFeedInput().     return input.build(new StringReader(xml)). }
